Html: If i try to open a saved character, or create a new character when I pick Death Knight - TankDK, 2.3.17 crashes. If I open a saved character (Death Knight - DPSDK) all is well, same for creating a new character. Anyone else experiencing this?
known issue and fix has already been checked in.
Now it's just a matter of waiting the 4-6 weeks for .18 to get here...

luckton wrote:

Now it's just a matter of waiting the 4-6 weeks for .18 to get here...

 

Or, you could not be an ass, and realize that we only leave builds up that long when they ate especially stable like .15 was. Typically builds come every 1-2 weeks. With this significant crashing bug, it's probably more like 1week.
